context.p:
Materials for PC & Hardware Requirements:
Working Laptop/ desktop
Windows OS 10 or higher
Microsoft store account

step.cmd: To download the Clockify app on Windows you will need a Microsoft account, if you do not set one up before proceeding.
Once you have an account you can search for Clockify in the app store.
Find the version you need, if you are using PC download Windows/Pc version.
Select the download button and the app will begin downloading.
After it is finished downloading run the application and login or signup.
You now have access Clockify from your PC desktop instead of the web browser.
